Remarks:
"Baseline dual?stage pipeline: class?specific [CTX]12 prompt, templated string, "
           "full ViT?B/16 image encoder unfrozen with BNNeck + ArcFace + SupCon + Triplet + Center; "
           "Adam (lr 1e?4, wd 5e?4), center_lr 0.5, center_loss_weight 0.0005; CosineAnnealingLR; "
           "prompt frozen in Stage?2; eval on 10 splits; ArcFace duplicate?param bug fixed."

Added diverse prompt_template_list; kept prompt frozen; enabled projection ??norm; "
           "switched optimizer to AdamW with component?wise LR/WD (vis 1e?5, prompt 1e?4); "
           "CosineAnnealingLR stepped per batch; all five losses retained.

"Scheduler changed to OneCycleLR (per?batch) while retaining v2 template diversity, AdamW, "
           "feature normalisation & losses  yielded best ViT performance.
"Ablation: disabled Triplet & Center losses (ArcFace + SupCon + ID only)  performance dropped.
Restored Triplet & Center; softened ArcFace (scale 20, margin 0.3)

Partial fine?tuning: set unfreeze_blocks=2 (last two ViT transformer blocks) while keeping v5 losses "
           "and ArcFace settings.
Extreme ArcFace (scale 35, margin 0.4) + Triplet OFF + center_loss_weight 0.0003 + Cosine LR  "
